The '''Anemo Archon Statue''' is a statue of the Anemo Archon, [[Barbatos]], located at the plaza in front of the [[Favonius Cathedral]]. The statue is in the image of Barbatos, with a hood, two wings, and its hands cupped together.

There is a sentence carved into the statue's pedestal, reading "The Gateway of Celestia" in [[Teyvat Language|Teyvat language]].

* [[Susie]] (Daytime)

==Trivia==
* Sitting on the statue's hands grants the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement "[[Beloved of the Anemo Archon]]."
